Los_Angeles.Biscuit Company Lofts:
The Biscuit Company Lofts is a 7-story building in Los Angeles, California. Built in 1925 as a factory, the building was converted to live/work lofts in 2006.


== History ==
Conceived as the west coast headquarters for the National Biscuit Company, this landmark structure was designed by E.J. Eckel.
